EventFormDto.description:
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for Event Information.
Used for API between the backend and the frontend.

description.description: Full description of the event (supports Markdown).

published.description: Whether the event is published and visible to users.

maxParticipants.description: Maximum number of participants (0 for unlimited).

city.description: City where the event takes place.

EventPatchDto.description:
DTO for partial updates to an event.
Only allows updating commonly changed fields individually.
For comprehensive updates, use PUT endpoint with EventFormDto instead.

OrderPatchDto.description:
DTO for partial updates to an order.
Only allows updating Status, Comments, and PaymentMethod fields.

RegistrationPatchDto.description:
DTO for partial updates to a registration.
Only allows updating Status, Type, and Notes fields.

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
